title: Sampler, ca. 1820
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 40 x 33 cm (15 3/4 x 13 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Verse, landscape with two houses, trees with birds, sheep on lawn and scattered flower and tree motifs surrounded by an angular border.
